thread.title: BRIEF-NoemaLife comments on alleged investigations for bid-rigging
thread.title_full: BRIEF-NoemaLife comments on alleged investigations for bid-rigging | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-NoemaLife comments on alleged investigations for bid-rigging
text:
Sept 30 NoemaLife SpA :
* In relation to the news circulated today in newspapers, the company says it did not receive any notice by the Milan public prosecutor in relation to investigations for alleged bid-rigging in the tender for hospital San Paolo in Milan
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
